MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the DG6 postcode area of Kirkcudbright. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 09.00am to safely carry out repairs to our overhead line equipment near to Bombie glen and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 07.38AM on 9th December 2020.
